item.title: Quick and dirty PDF reports for Plain Text Accounting
item.description: Say you want to hand out financial reports (such as a balance sheet and an income statement) to a non-techie someone. Most likely that means handing out the statements on paper. Given that I’m doing Plain Text Accounting, what is an easy way to generate decent looking output on paper? hledger has two convenient commands to generate a balance sheet and an income statement.
